content: क्षयः [क्षि-अच्] {@--1@} A house, residence, abode; यातनाश्च यमक्षये <ls>Ms. 6. 61</ls>; निर्जगाम पुनस्तस्मात्क्षयान्नारायणस्य ह <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--2@} Loss, decline, waste, wane, decay, diminution; आयुषः क्षयः <ls>R. 3. 69</ls>; धनक्षये वर्धति जाठराग्निः <ls>Pt. 2. 178</ls>; so चंद्रक्षयः, क्षयपक्षः &c. {@--3@} Destruction, end, termination; निशाक्षये याति ह्रियैव पांडुतां <ls>Rs. 1. 9</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 60.</ls> {@--4@} Pecuniary loss; <ls>Ms. 8. 401.</ls> {@--5@} Fall (as of prices.) {@--6@} Removal. {@--7@} Universal destruction (प्रलय). {@--8@} Consumption. {@--9@} A disease in general. {@--10@} The negative sign or quantity, minus (in algebra). {@--11@} Family, race. {@--12@} The house of Yama.
